title: Configure the git text editor
description: When using Git, sometimes you need to write a commit message or make other changes in a text editor. By default, Git uses the system's default text editor, which may not be the one you prefer. In this challenge, you will learn how to configure the text editor used by Git.

meta.title: Git | Text Editor Configuration
meta.description: Learn how to configure the text editor used by Git for commit messages and other changes in this programming tutorial overview.
meta.keywords: Git, Text Editor, Commit Messages, Programming, Configuration
